import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const PostPage = ({ posts, handleDelete }) => { const { id } = useParams(); // id is used in Route // specify the post we want to see by finding the post.id const post = posts.find(post => (post.id).toString() === id); // === is for string match, == for numeric return (
{/* if post is true then && ... */} {post && <>

{post.title}

{post.datetime}

{post.body}

} {!post && <>

Post Not Found

Well, that's disappointing.

Visit Our Homepage

}
) } export default PostPage
